title: League of legends wont Open
body: Ive been trying to open the game but it wont get past the pvp patch kernel. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game. this is really annoying anyone have an idea on what to do?

replies.body: The kernel error you're receiving is usually due to a permissions issue.  The patcher is trying to launch, but a setting with your OS may be blocking it.  Running as admin as Rineyy suggested is good, but it only provides access for that single moment.  I recommend going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to help fix this up for good.  Hope that helps!
Go to local disk (C) > Riot Games > League of Legends > lol.launcher.admin. Let us know the results.
It actually started, it was slow but still opened thank you

Glad you were able to get it fixed. Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!


http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg
the un-admmined version still wont run. any ideas on how to fix that?

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/template_lcu_changelog_1280x720.jpg?itok=uV6zjzTq

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)


http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
